mapper.sql: Id, BannerName, ImageRelativePath, LinkUrl, ImageTag, WebSiteType, tblWebId, SortID, LastUpdateTime, ValidBeginTime, ValidEndTime
mapper.select:
select top 5
from tbl_PCBanner where tblWebId = #{tblWebId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ValidBeginTime<=getdate() and ValidEndTime>=getdate() order by SortID desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_PCBanner (Id, BannerName, ImageRelativePath, LinkUrl, ImageTag, WebSiteType, tblWebId, SortID, LastUpdateTime, ValidBeginTime, ValidEndTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bannername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagerelativepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagetag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websitetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tblwebid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

Id,

tblWebId,

mapper.update:
update tbl_PCBanner
BannerName = #{bannername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ImageRelativePath = #{imagerelativepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LinkUrl = #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ImageTag = #{imagetag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WebSiteType = #{websitetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tblWebId = #{tblwebid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ValidBeginTime = #{validbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ValidEndTime = #{validendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
